typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	pLote as string,
	pMesAnoRef as string
}
source(output(
		ID_LOTE as decimal(28,0),
		ID_ATLYS_ADJ as decimal(28,0),
		ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO as decimal(28,0),
		ID_CLIENTE as string,
		NOTA_FISCAL as string,
		DT_EMISSAO_NF as timestamp,
		VLR_ORIG_NFST as decimal(10,2),
		SERIE as string,
		CONTA_CLIENTE as string,
		CNPJ_CPF as string,
		NOM_CLIENTE as string,
		NUM_TERMINAL as string,
		VLR_CONTEST_AJUSTE as decimal(10,2),
		VLR_ATRIBUIDO as decimal(10,2),
		DT_ATRIBUICAO as timestamp,
		HR_ATRIBUICAO as string,
		DT_AJUSTE as timestamp,
		HR_AJUSTE as string,
		OPERADORA as string,
		CODIGO_OPERADORA as string,
		COD_MOTIVO_AJUSTES as string,
		DESC_MOTIVO_AJUSTE as string,
		DATA_ABERTURA_IMPU as timestamp,
		DATA_FECH_IMPUG as timestamp,
		DSPUT_ID as string,
		TP_NOTA_FISCAL as string,
		CLASSE_RECEBER as string,
		CONTA_CONTABIL as string,
		DESCR_CONTA_CONTABIL as string,
		NUMERO_FATURA as string,
		VALOR_DOCTO_ORIGINAL as decimal(15,2),
		MES_ANO_REFERENTE as string,
		DATA_VENC_FATUR as timestamp,
		VALOR_PAGAMENTO as decimal(15,2),
		DATA_ATRIBUICAO_PGTO as timestamp,
		FATU_ATRIBUIDA as string,
		DT_EMISSAO_FATURA as timestamp,
		MES_ANO_FATURA as string,
		VALOR_FATURA as decimal(15,2),
		SALDO_DEVEDOR as decimal(15,2),
		UF as string,
		OPERADORA_REAL as string,
		SALDO_FATURA_INI as decimal(15,2),
		SALDO_FATURA_FIM as decimal(15,2),
		SEQ_RECEBIVEL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("SELECT l.ID_LOTE, adj.ID_ATLYS_ADJ ,adj.ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO ,adj.ID_CLIENTE ,adj.NOTA_FISCAL ,adj.DT_EMISSAO_NF ,adj.VLR_ORIG_NFST ,adj.SERIE ,adj.CONTA_CLIENTE ,adj.CNPJ_CPF ,adj.NOM_CLIENTE ,adj.NUM_TERMINAL ,adj.VLR_CONTEST_AJUSTE ,adj.VLR_ATRIBUIDO ,adj.DT_ATRIBUICAO ,adj.HR_ATRIBUICAO ,adj.DT_AJUSTE ,adj.HR_AJUSTE ,adj.OPERADORA ,adj.CODIGO_OPERADORA ,adj.COD_MOTIVO_AJUSTES ,adj.DESC_MOTIVO_AJUSTE ,adj.DATA_ABERTURA_IMPU ,adj.DATA_FECH_IMPUG ,adj.DSPUT_ID,adj.TP_NOTA_FISCAL ,adj.CLASSE_RECEBER ,adj.CONTA_CONTABIL ,adj.DESCR_CONTA_CONTABIL ,adj.NUMERO_FATURA ,adj.VALOR_DOCTO_ORIGINAL ,adj.MES_ANO_REFERENTE ,adj.DATA_VENC_FATUR ,adj.VALOR_PAGAMENTO ,adj.DATA_ATRIBUICAO_PGTO ,adj.FATU_ATRIBUIDA ,adj.DT_EMISSAO_FATURA ,adj.MES_ANO_FATURA ,adj.VALOR_FATURA ,adj.SALDO_DEVEDOR ,adj.UF ,adj.OPERADORA_REAL ,adj.SALDO_FATURA_INI ,adj.SALDO_FATURA_FIM ,adj.SEQ_RECEBIVEL FROM CONVENIO.CVTB_ATLYS_ADJ adj WITH (NOLOCK), CONVENIO.CVTB_LOTE_ARQUIVO la WITH (NOLOCK), CONVENIO.CVTB_LOTE l WITH (NOLOCK) where adj.ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO = la.ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO and la.ID_LOTE = l.ID_LOTE and l.ID_LOTE = convert(numeric(38), {$pLote})"),
	format: 'query') ~> TabelaADJ
TabelaADJ derive(NUM_CONTROLE_RECLAMACAO_NORMALIZADO = iif(isNull(DSPUT_ID), concat(SERIE, '123'), DSPUT_ID),
		NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG_NORMALIZADO = NOTA_FISCAL,
		FL_STATUS_GERAL = 'NT',
		NOME_BILLING = 'Atlys',
		CD_CRIADO_POR = 'Carga ADF - CargaArqAtlys',
		DT_CRIADO_EM = add(currentTimestamp(), hours(-3)),
		MES_ANO_REF_ARQ = concat(right($pMesAnoRef, 2), left($pMesAnoRef, 4))) ~> derivedColumn1
derivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ID_CONTESTACAO as decimal(28,0),
		ID_CLIENTE as string,
		NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG as string,
		DT_EMISSAO_NF_ORIG as timestamp,
		VLR_ORIG_NSFT as decimal(15,2),
		SERIE_NF as string,
		COD_IDENT_CLI as string,
		CPF_CNPJ as string,
		NOME_CLIENTE as string,
		TERMINAL as string,
		VLR_TOTAL_ATRIBUIDO as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_ATRIBUIDO as decimal(15,2),
		DT_ATRIBUICAO as timestamp,
		DT_AJUSTE as timestamp,
		DESCR_OPERADORA as string,
		COD_OPERADORA as string,
		COD_MOTIVO_AJUSTE as string,
		DESC_MOTIVO_AJUSTE as string,
		NUM_CONTROLE_RECLAMACAO as string,
		CLASSE_RECEBER as string,
		CONTA_FINANCEIRA as string,
		DESC_CONTA_FINANCEIRA as string,
		NUM_FATURA_ORIGINAL as string,
		VLR_DOC_ORIGINAL as decimal(15,2),
		FATURA_ATRIBUIDA as string,
		VLR_FATURA as decimal(15,2),
		UF_FATURA as string,
		SEQ_RECEBIVEL as string,
		DT_EMISSAO as timestamp,
		MODELO as string,
		NUMORDEMDOITEM as decimal(3,0),
		BC_ICMS as decimal(15,2),
		ICMS as decimal(15,2),
		ALIQUOTA_ICMS as decimal(15,2),
		BC_ICMS_RECALCULADA as decimal(15,2),
		ICMS_RECALCULADO as decimal(15,2),
		ICMS_PARA_RESSARCIMENTO as decimal(15,2),
		SITUACAO as string,
		MES_APURACAO as string,
		TIPO_DOC as decimal(1,0),
		COD_CONSUMIDOR as string,
		CHAVE_AUTENTICACAO as string,
		TOTAL_MESTRE as decimal(15,2),
		BC_ICMS_MESTRE as decimal(15,2),
		ICMS_DESTACADO as decimal(15,2),
		INSCRICAO_ESTADUAL as string,
		RAZAO_SOCIAL as string,
		FL_STATUS_GERAL as string,
		ID_LOTE_AJUSTE as decimal(28,0),
		ID_ENTREGA_RESSARCIMENTO as decimal(28,0),
		CD_ITEM as string,
		DS_ITEM as string,
		HR_AJUSTE as string,
		HR_ATRIBUICAO as string,
		NOME_BILLING as string,
		TIPO_CLIENTE as string,
		DT_ABERTURA_IMPUG as timestamp,
		DT_FECHA_IMPUG as timestamp,
		SALDO_DEVEDOR as decimal(15,2),
		SALDO_FATURA_INI as decimal(15,2),
		SALDO_FATURA_FIM as decimal(15,2),
		COD_CLIENTE as string,
		TIPO_DOCUMENTO as string,
		NOME_FANTASIA as string,
		COD_GRUPO as string,
		NOME_GRUPO_ECONOMICO as string,
		SEGMENTO_CLIENTE as string,
		SUB_SEGMENTO_CLIENTE as string,
		SEGMENTO_VALOR as string,
		CLASSE_ELEGIBILIDADE as string,
		DESCR_SERV_AJUSTE as string,
		DESCR_SERV as string,
		CONTACONTABIL_DB as string,
		CONTACONTABIL_CR as string,
		DESCR_CONTACONTABIL_DB as string,
		DESCR_CONTACONTABIL_CR as string,
		SALDO_POS_AJUSTE as decimal(15,2),
		TIPO_OPERACAO as string,
		TIPO_TERMINAL as string,
		DONO_RECEITA as string,
		SUBTYPE_CODE as decimal(19,0),
		TIPO_DESCR_SERV as string,
		DT_VENCTO_FAT_FUTURA as timestamp,
		VLR_IMPOSTO_CONTESTADO as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_IMPOSTO_ICMS as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_BRUTO_ITEM as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_OUTROS_IMPOSTOS as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_AJUSTE_ITEM as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_CREDITO_AJUSTE as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_CREDITO_ITEM as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_DEVOLUCAO as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_FATURA_FUTURA as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_CONTESTADO_FUTURO as decimal(15,2),
		LOGIN_ATENDIMENTO as string,
		DT_VENC_FATURA_ORIGINAL as timestamp,
		DT_ATRIBUICAO_PGTO as timestamp,
		NUM_ITEM_ESTORNADO as decimal(10,0),
		FLG_RETIFICADO as string,
		TERMINAL_115 as string,
		VALOR_ITEM_115 as decimal(15,2),
		DT_CRIADO_EM as timestamp,
		CD_CRIADO_POR as string,
		DT_ATUALIZADO_EM as timestamp,
		CD_ATUALIZADO_POR as string,
		MES_ANO_FAT_ORIGINAL as string,
		MES_ANO_FAT_AJUSTE as string,
		VLR_PAGAMENTO_FAT_ORIGINAL as decimal(15,2),
		ID_ITEM_CONVENIO_115 as decimal(28,0),
		NUM_CONTROLE_RECLAMACAO_NORMALIZADO as string,
		NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG_NORMALIZADO as string,
		COD_FAC_CD as decimal(10,0),
		CCM_SERVICO_CONTESTADO as string,
		COD_TIPO_RCBL_FATURA as string,
		DESCR_RCBL_FATURA as string,
		DT_PAGAMENTO as timestamp,
		DEBIT_ID as string,
		DT_EMISSAO_FATURA_ORIGINAL as timestamp,
		UF_NF as string,
		VLR_PGTO_ALOCADO as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_TOTAL_PGTO as decimal(15,2),
		CREDIT_ID as string,
		DT_REFERENCIA as timestamp,
		DT_IMPORTACAO as timestamp,
		STEP_EXECUTION_ID as decimal(18,0),
		JOB_EXECUTION_ID as decimal(18,0),
		ID_MESTRE_CONVENIO_115 as decimal(28,0),
		FL_MANUAL_CONCILIACAO as string,
		DT_CONCILIACAO as timestamp,
		DT_EMISSAO_115 as timestamp,
		MES_ANO_REF_ARQ as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ID_CLIENTE,
		VLR_TOTAL_ATRIBUIDO = VLR_ATRIBUIDO,
		DT_ATRIBUICAO,
		DT_AJUSTE,
		DESC_MOTIVO_AJUSTE,
		CLASSE_RECEBER,
		DT_EMISSAO_FATURA_ORIGINAL = DT_EMISSAO_FATURA,
		SEQ_RECEBIVEL,
		HR_AJUSTE,
		HR_ATRIBUICAO,
		SALDO_DEVEDOR,
		SALDO_FATURA_INI,
		SALDO_FATURA_FIM,
		MES_ANO_FAT_ORIGINAL = MES_ANO_FATURA,
		NUM_CONTROLE_RECLAMACAO_NORMALIZADO,
		NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG_NORMALIZADO,
		NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG = NOTA_FISCAL,
		DT_EMISSAO_NF_ORIG = DT_EMISSAO_NF,
		ID_LOTE_AJUSTE = ID_LOTE,
		VLR_ORIG_NSFT = VLR_ORIG_NFST,
		SERIE_NF = SERIE,
		COD_IDENT_CLI = CONTA_CLIENTE,
		CPF_CNPJ = CNPJ_CPF,
		NOME_CLIENTE = NOM_CLIENTE,
		TERMINAL = NUM_TERMINAL,
		VLR_ATRIBUIDO = VLR_CONTEST_AJUSTE,
		DESCR_OPERADORA = OPERADORA,
		COD_OPERADORA = CODIGO_OPERADORA,
		NUM_CONTROLE_RECLAMACAO = DSPUT_ID,
		CONTA_FINANCEIRA = CONTA_CONTABIL,
		DESC_CONTA_FINANCEIRA = DESCR_CONTA_CONTABIL,
		NUM_FATURA_ORIGINAL = NUMERO_FATURA,
		VLR_DOC_ORIGINAL = VALOR_DOCTO_ORIGINAL,
		MES_ANO_FAT_ORIGINAL = MES_ANO_REFERENTE,
		VLR_PAGAMENTO_FAT_ORIGINAL = VALOR_PAGAMENTO,
		FATURA_ATRIBUIDA = FATU_ATRIBUIDA,
		MES_ANO_FAT_AJUSTE = MES_ANO_FATURA,
		VLR_FATURA = VALOR_FATURA,
		UF_FATURA = UF,
		DT_ABERTURA_IMPUG = DATA_ABERTURA_IMPU,
		DT_FECHA_IMPUG = DATA_FECH_IMPUG,
		TIPO_DOCUMENTO = CNPJ_CPF,
		DT_VENCTO_FAT_FUTURA = DATA_VENC_FATUR,
		DT_ATRIBUICAO_PGTO = DATA_ATRIBUICAO_PGTO,
		COD_MOTIVO_AJUSTE = COD_MOTIVO_AJUSTES,
		FL_STATUS_GERAL,
		CD_CRIADO_POR,
		NOME_BILLING,
		DT_CRIADO_EM,
		MES_ANO_REF_ARQ
	)) ~> TabelaCONTESTACAO
